function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Ineffectiveness of extreme quarantine measures and detailed contact tracing for the scale of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential ineffectiveness of traditional public-health strategies for tackling covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncontrolled transmission and high infectious period","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Introduction of multiple measures simultaneously without clear evaluation","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Underreported cases of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate individual control measures during chinese spring festival holiday","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High incidence of confirmed cases in hubei and other provinces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Initial high case reproduction number r0 of 3.15","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Effectiveness of control measures on trajectory of the epidemic outside wuhan city","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Strong correlation between number of cases and travelers from wuhan","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Delayed arrival of
